modName: Destroyer Race well more of a class actually xD
summary: adds a Destroyer as a playable race...more of a \"class\" though, i wanted to make something with an ability i actually use so there xD
descriptionHtml:
adds a Destroyer as a playable race...more of a \"class\" though, cos i wanted to make something with an ability i actually use..



has a skill that increases offense (crit chance, damage, sneak atk) when using 2handed weapons..
to balance it though, damage taken from enemies is also increased

i found it quite fun playin wit it so, well just sharing xD

much more fun when playing in Master difficulty or any mod that increases difficulty :D

so there..

ps. if you want to edit or modify any of it, just feel free to do so
author: lolstaeka11
